introduction: SYNOPSISJi-hun is confused about his relationship with Da-hye. He wanders off to run into Young-ah working on the street. His relationship with Da-hye started out of sympathy about her experience of abuse. Da-hye refuses to be pitied by him and becomes engaged to another man. He seeks comforts in Young-ah and Da-hye commits suicide due to the trauma in her past. Ji-hun comes to Busan to see pregnant Young-ah but she refuses his proposal.故事Jihoon受到Dahye和流浪者的爱的打扰，并向后胡同的婴儿女孩发现了真相。Dahye的发病率和吉顺的爱情开始于覆盖她父亲离校后的欺负者的影响，黛宁拒绝吉顺爱同情，婴儿成为自助主妇。然后，Dahye与另一个人交往，Ji-hoon坚持为婴儿安排Dahye。最后，没有赢得病态幻想和过失恶梦的达恩，在婚姻中自杀。来到釜山寻找怀孕婴儿的姬infant想与婴儿结合，但婴儿被播种。
